scripts.env:verify: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('.env.local')){console.log('‚úÖ .env.local ÌååÏùº Ï°¥Ïû¨');const content=fs.readFileSync('.env.local','utf8');console.log('üìä Google Script URL:',content.includes('AKfycbzMKcB94ld2xP6gu0xlRBf4hI16cRTZ8JhCQT0iG3QeToQt4VmZu5X7lYNV5YSgQaJB')?'‚úÖ Ï†ïÌôïÌï®':'‚ùå Î∂àÏùºÏπò');}else{console.log('‚ùå .env.local ÌååÏùº ÏóÜÏùå');}"
scripts.check:pdf-reports: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const reportDir=path.join(process.cwd(),'report');if(fs.existsSync(reportDir)){const files=fs.readdirSync(reportDir).filter(f=>f.endsWith('.pdf'));console.log('üìÑ PDF Î≥¥Í≥†ÏÑú:',files.length,'Í∞ú');files.forEach(f=>console.log(' -',f));}else{console.log('‚ùå report Ìè¥Îçî ÏóÜÏùå');}"
scripts.deploy:correct: npm run setup:env-correct && npm run build && npm run vercel:deploy
scripts.deploy:complete: npm run build && npm run vercel:deploy && npm run test:beta-feedback
